resources.string: Enjoy listening to a music, podcast and everything you want with your friends

To connect to a party:
1. Click button "Connect"
2. Scan your friend's QR
3. Enjoy

To stream music:
1. Click button "Stream"
 2. Grant permissions to the app
3. Start streaming music
4. Let your friends scan QR code of created party
Neighbors complain about loud music? Want to listen to the same music together in different rooms or in transport without losing one of the headphones? There is a solution!
